ch0005_00_kanna/0101_0701_01_10:
Listen, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Just like how thin ice on a lake 
gradually thickens...
ch0005_00_kanna/0101_0701_02_10:
it’s important to keep up gradual improvement.
You did well to come again today.
ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0701_01_10:
No matter how resistant to cold I get,
I’ll never be able to beat...
ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0701_03_10:
I was a very sickly child, so I went to an
island with very clean air to help me heal.
ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0701_04_10:
I had to live alone in a room without people or
Pokémon until I was fully cured.
ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0702_01_10:
Back in those days, my best friend 
was a stuffed toy Pokémon.
ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0702_02_10:
It was a big stuffed toy Lapras.
It shows up in my dreams even to this day.
ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0701_01_10:
Have you seen a pack of the adorable
Sea Lion Pokémon, Seel?
ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0701_02_10:
They swim through arctic rivers and roll around
on icebergs as if they were spirits of the sea.
ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0701_03_10:
And the colder it gets, the better they feel.
It must be wonderful...
ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0701_04_10:
to be able to gaze up at a sky of ice
from the bottom of the frigid water.
ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0702_01_10:
Seel feel better the colder it gets, but if you
give them a hug, they’re surprisingly warm.
ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0702_02_10:
They’re covered in squishy blubber and fluffy fur.
It feels wonderful!
ch0005_00_kanna/0603_0701_01_10:
There was a time when I just traveled and
traveled, riding on Lapras’s back.
ch0005_00_kanna/0603_0701_02_10: Back in those days, Lapras were near extinction.
ch0005_00_kanna/0603_0701_03_10:
So I would search for Lapras to protect them
with Ice-type moves.
ch0005_00_kanna/0603_0702_01_10:
Now that we’ve been protecting them for so
long, you can find Lapras in the wild again.
ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0701_01_10:
The reason I started my adventures was because
I wanted to reach an aurora.
ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0701_02_10: Of course, now I know that’s impossible.
ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0701_03_10:
It doesn’t matter why you started out.
What matters is that you keep moving forward,
even if your goal changes.
ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0702_01_10:
It’s funny to think that the girl who was
chasing auroras became an Elite Four member.
ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0702_02_10:
But even though I was able to join the Elite Four,
I was never able to reach an aurora.
Hee hee!
ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0701_01_10:
How strong do you want to become at Pokémon
battles, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0701_02_10: I’ve always wanted to just keep getting stronger.
ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0701_03_10:
As the ice Pokémon Trainer of the Kanto Elite
Four, and as the Trainer for my own Pokémon,
I can always be stronger.
ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0702_01_10:
I’ve always been fighting against evildoers who
would try to harm my friends.
ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0702_02_10:
Protecting Lapras was easy, thanks to my
name as an Elite Four member.
ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0702_03_10:
The secret to my strength is my
strong desire to protect Pokémon I love.
ch0005_00_kanna/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, you can have this.
Use it how you like.
ch0005_00_kanna/1701_0701_02_10:
But when you do use it, be sure to
thank me first.
ch0005_00_kanna/1701_0702_01_10:
No, I’m not going to tell you how you
should use it.
ch0005_00_kanna/1701_0702_02_10:
Even if you make a mistake, that will be its
own lesson.
ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_01_10:
What you aim for, what ideals you hold—
that’s all up to you.
ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_02_10:
But don’t do anything that would make your
Pokémon sad.
ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_03_10: If your heart ever becomes cold as ice...
ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_04_10: I’ll be right there to thaw you out.
ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_05_10:
In fact, I might get so heated that you’d
get burned.
ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0702_01_10: I wonder why whenever I look at you...
ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0702_02_10: I feel a smile creep onto my face.
ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0701_01_10:
I feel like my stuffed-toy collection is going
to keep growing as long as I stay on this island.
ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0701_03_10:
And they’re all in poses that I’ve never seen
anywhere else!
ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0701_04_10: Of course I need to buy them all.
ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0701_05_10:
*sigh*
There’s no way I could choose just one.
ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0702_01_10:
Since I have the opportunity, I might as well
try to gather all the stuffed toys.
ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0702_02_10:
But only the cute ones, of course.
Could you help me choose?
ch0005_00_kanna/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
Wash your face with cold water—
it’ll wake you right up.
ch0005_00_kanna/3002_0701_01_10:
What a beautiful morning!
I bet it would feel good to surf on a Pokémon.
ch0005_00_kanna/3003_0701_01_10:
You need the most energy around noon.
It’s the same for people and Pokémon.
ch0005_00_kanna/3004_0701_01_10:
Everyone is getting more active...
But there are still some Pokémon that
are zoning out...
ch0005_00_kanna/3005_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon were practicing their moves tonight.
It’s dark now, so watch out for all the ice.
ch0005_00_kanna/3006_0701_01_10:
Go to bed early, before you catch a cold. But if
you come down with a fever, I’ll cool you off.
